Uses of Class
pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel.CellRepresentation

    • Uses of CellRepresentation in pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel

      Subclasses of CellRepresentation in pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ImageCellRepresentation
      Abstract class that draws an image (of a cell) in a GridPanel
      class  MultipleImageCellRepresentation
      Represents a cell by drawing a sequence of images with a defined delay between each other.
      class  OverlayCellRepresentation
      Represents a cell by overlaying two other CellRepresentations on top of each other
      class  SingleImageCellRepresentation
      Draws a single image as a Cell Representation
      class  SingleImageWithStateCellRepresentation
      Draws a single image as a Cell Representation, allowing it to be enabled or disabled.
      class  SlideCellRepresentation 
      class  TremblingCellRepresentation
      Represents a cell by showing an original CellRepresentation and changing its position slightly to emulate "shaking"
      Methods in pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel that return CellRepresentation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CellRepresentation GridPanel.get(int row, int column)
      Returns the CellRepresentation representing the cell identified by the given row and column
      CellRepresentation SlideCellRepresentation.getRepresentation()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GridPanel.put(int row, int column, CellRepresentation cell)
      Place a CellRepresentation in a given position of the GridLine
      void GridPanel.putOverlay(int row, int column, CellRepresentation cell)
      Places a CellRepresentation in a GridPanel cell as an overlay.
      void GridPanel.remove(CellRepresentation cell)
      Removes the given CellRepresentation from the grid.
      void GridPanel.removeOverlay(int row, int column, CellRepresentation cell)
      Removes a specified overlayed CellRepresentation from a cell
      void CellRepresentation.EndHandler.representationEnded(CellRepresentation cell)
